name: Meteorian
description:
Hello! I decided to share my all projects who I "finished" during my half-year journey of learning programming and Unity from scratch. 

This was my second project who I've done month after Mad Mage. 

Game is about flying a spaceship ,  destroying falling meteors and buying upgrades for Your ship. (Psst... I heard that movement can be annoying. Be patient please. :D)

Have fun and leave comment!

You can check my others projects later.
